mapper.sql: id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_info, head_img, create_time
mapper.select: select id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_info, head_img, create_time from sys_user;

select r.id, r.role_name, r.enabled, r.create_by, r.create_time, u.user_name as "user.user_name", u.user_email as "user.user_email" from sys_user u inner join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id = #{userId}
